column1: Does The Facility Have An Organisational Structure
Is The Director A Medically Trained Person?
Does The Facility Have Statutory Requirements?--
Letter Of Permission To Set Up/Operate
Proof Of Change Of Land Use Fire Clearance
Copies Of Relevant Statutory Instruments E.G. Public Health Act 2013, Botswana Health Professions Act,2001
Does The Clinic Have Policies And Procedures For The Following?--
Management Of Patient Records And Retention Times
What Are The Services Provided At The Facility?--
Are The Following Treatment Methods Available In The Facility?--
Addiction Treatment (Alcohol And Drug Addiction, Gambling Addiction, Sex Addiction, Mood Addiction, Gaming Addiction)
Mental Health/ Dual Diagnosis Treatment (Anxiety, Depression, Trauma, Sexual Disorders, Mood Disorders, Psychosis, Psychosocial Such As Misconduct, Missing School, Missing Work And Malingering
Chronic Pain Management (For Individuals Who Have Been On Prolonged Medication Use, Includes Medication Adherence)
Psychometric Assessment (For The Disorders Mentioned Above And Others)
What Is Number Of Specimens Tested Per Month?
